data.title: The Official Site of Oscar Schmidt
data.meta_description: The official site of Oscar Schmidt, includes biography, career highlights, photos and quotes
data.text:
HOME NEWS BIOGRAPHY FAST FACTS PHOTOS QUOTES BUSINESS

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

I would like to sell merchandise/create an ad campaign using Oscar Schmidt. Who do I contact?

If you would like to use the name, image, likeness, voice or signature of Oscar Schmidt, please fill out our Business Inquiries form to the best of your ability. The form will be forwarded on to a Marketing Executive for review.

I am looking for a particular picture of Oscar Schmidt; can you help me find it?

To find photos not shown on Oscar Schmidt's Web site, please visit an on-line image bank such as .

I would like to purchase a photo of Oscar Schmidt; which ones are available for purchase and where can I buy it?

To purchase photos of Oscar Schmidt, please visit Legends Archive.

Can I use graphics and/or images from one of your Web sites?

CMG Worldwide does not grant permission for use of copyrighted artwork/graphics without a license and/or permission.

I am doing a research paper/school report on Oscar Schmidt; can you give me more information?

All of the information CMG has about Oscar Schmidt is on this Web site. If there is information you cannot find on this site, you may be able to find a more complete biography at Encyclopedia.com.

Is my e-mail going directly to Oscar Schmidt or their family?

Your e-mail does not go to Oscar Schmidt personally. Your e-mail goes to the webmaster of CMG Worldwide, the company that represents the name/image/likeness of Oscar Schmidt. Although we encourage your thoughts on the site, it is not likely that Oscar Schmidt will see your e-mail.

Will you answer my e-mail?

CMG Worldwide tries to answer as many e-mails as possible, however, the volume at which we receive them sometimes makes this task impossible. We cannot guarantee that your e-mail will be answered.

Can I have Oscar Schmidt's e-mail/home address?

CMG Worldwide does not give out direct client contact information.

Can I have an autograph of Oscar Schmidt?

Unfortunately, CMG Worldwide does not distribute autographs of our clients.

Can I link my Web site to yours?

No need to ask us to link to our Web sites, as a matter of fact, we welcome it. Send us an e-mail if you want us to link to you. (Please only submit Web sites with relevancy to Oscar Schmidt. CMG Worldwide reserves the right to refuse these requests.)

I have memorabilia/autograph of Oscar Schmidt; can you tell me how much it is worth?

Our memorabilia experts are able to provide professional appraisals on all sports and entertainment related items. There is a nominal fee for this service, which will include a written appraisal. We also are actively purchasing vintage sports memorabilia and can provide auction services for those who wish to sell their items. For more information, please visit CMG Worldwide Memorabilia Services.

I am looking for information that is not on your site; can you answer my question?

All of the information we have on Oscar Schmidt is on this site.

I think there is false information on one of your Web sites. Who do I tell?

Although we always try to get all of the facts straight, sometimes it is impossible. If you think a fact is wrong on a site, please don't hesitate to tell us. We'd be more than happy to check it out.

I can't find a certain film, book or CD by or about Oscar Schmidt; can you tell me where to find it?

Search for the item on Amazon.com, and you should be able to find anything that is currently being published. If that doesn't work, try searching on eBay you can sometimes find out of print items there.

I am looking for a poster of Oscar Schmidt; can you help me find it?

A great place to search for posters is on AllPosters.com. You may be able to find what you are looking for there.

What is CMG?

CMG Worldwide is the home of properties and personalities considered to be among the most prestigious in the licensing industry. We are the agent listed for the properties on our site. We license out the use of their name, image or likeness to be used on merchandise or in a promotional use. Visit www.cmgworldwide.com for more information.
